definition: a careless person/scatterbrain/frivolous and forgetful/abbr. for 馬馬虎虎、大大咧咧、嘻嘻哈哈|马马虎虎、大大咧咧、嘻嘻哈哈
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin

sentences.english: His experience ought to be a warning to careless people.
sentences.chinese: 他的經驗對那些馬大哈來說是一個警告。

sentences.english: I'm a bit of a klutz and that can be pretty embarrassing.
sentences.chinese: 我這個人有點馬大哈，有時候會出一些很尷尬的事。

sentences.english: Don't think of other work, specifically looking for a careless accident.
sentences.chinese: 上班不要想其他，事故專找馬大哈。

sentences.english: Being careless, he often makes mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 由於馬大哈，他經常出錯。
